title: Chinese chicken and mushroom soup
ingredients: ['For stock', 'chicken bones', '2 bay leaves', '3 peppercorns', '2 onions, sliced in half, skins left on for colour', 'plenty of pepper to taste', 'water', 'For soup', '1 chicken breast, baked in foil until cooked and then shredded', '2 large mushrooms, thinly sliced', '2 spring onions, sliced (for garnish)']
